body:
One of the possible way is to use a common service and use that service to retrieve and store/hold that data. You can see this in example of Parent and children communicate via a service.

Another way is to use cookies to store such data and in each component you read that data from cookie, but cookie has limitation in terms of how much data you can store there.

Third option is to harness the power of local storage.
title: Store Api response in model and share that response in multiple component
